name: The Dragon
description: Rolling eyes fall... Install it for Peacock or replace a casual suit of your choice.

options.name: Peacock Addon
options.tooltip: Install the suit to your game as an addon without replacing existing suits. This will only work if you're playing with Peacock.

english.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_THE_DRAGON_DESC: No one will question your authority on the streets in this legendary dragon's suit.

french.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_THE_DRAGON_DESC: Personne ne remettra en question votre autorité dans les rues avec ce costume de dragon légendaire.

italian.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_THE_DRAGON_DESC: Nessuno metterà in dubbio la vostra autorità per le strade con questo leggendario costume da drago.

german.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_THE_DRAGON_DESC: In diesem legendären Drachenkostüm wird niemand Ihre Autorität auf den Straßen in Frage stellen.

spanish.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_THE_DRAGON_DESC: Nadie cuestionará tu autoridad en las calles con este legendario traje de dragón.

russian.UI_TOKEN_OUTFIT_HERO_THE_DRAGON_DESC: Никто не усомнится в вашем авторитете на улицах в этом легендарном костюме дракона.

options.name: Shirtless
options.tooltip: Bare your chest. Like a dragon!

options.name: Shirtless with Tattoo
options.tooltip: Complete your cosplay with a back tattoo of Kiryu's dragon.
